main event: A military observer in Tsu Shima, Japan, witnessed a deep red, round object that pulsated from deep red to light orange for approximately 10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was seen at 240° azimuth and 10° above the horizon., It changed colors from deep red to light orange., The object disappeared over the horizon after 10 minutes., The observer evaluated the object, suggesting it may have been Mars., No photographs were present in the report document.
